attributes.action: Give the Palestinians a direct imported source of food + water
attributes.additional_details: We are a group of school students who are really upset with the wars going on all around the world and want to make a change in how the world is being ran. This is a big topic in today's world and life is being taken away from innocent Palestinians.
attributes.background: In the short term, we want food to be given to the Palestinians as they are in an open prison. Food should be imported or at least money for food to the Palestinian government. In the long term, we would like the money and support to the Israeli to stop.

rejection.details:
The UK is already providing aid to Palestinians, including food and water.

You can find out about the UK's support for Palestinians in this Government policy paper: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/humanitarian-situation-in-gaza-the-uk-governments-response/humanitarian-situation-in-gaza-the-uk-governments-response

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to increase the aid it is providing to Palestinians, if that's something you'd like to happen.
